label: CITY
description: A photograph of a city scene. Streets, people, architecture

label: ARTEFAKT
description: A photograph of archaeological artifacts, like pieces of degraded metal, ceramic objects, or jewelry. An isolated object, or several objects, either whole or shards, that have been cleaned and presented, either isolated, or with a scale next to them

label: DIG
description: An archaeological dig. Remnants of a past civilization, such as walls, with ground sondes, trenches. Possible tools and people working

label: GRAVE
description: A open grave with remnants of grave goods, or bones

label: PLANT
description: A photograph of trees, flower, or other plants
